events.text: Welcome student. I see this is your first quiz at Dream School. Before we begin:
At Dream School, students demonstrate their knowledge by beating video games
They don't merely PLAY the game, they BECOME the game!
That sounds really transcendental.
(or like a commercial for a video game)
This quiz will be testing your knowledge of academic integrity
I assume you've read the BEAN KING V. DREAM SCHOOL case? If not, you may never exit the forest
[shake rate=20 level=10]alive[/shake] that is...
Dang, these quizzes are SERIOUS
[shake rate=20 level=10]DEADLY[/shake]
okay, got it. Point has been made.
serious. [b]deadly[/b] serious.
As in you may not make it back to your dorm. Your actual body is here in the game now.
Dang. They weren't kidding when they said Dream School was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
So what do I do?
Your task is simple. You have 60 SECONDS to find your way through the forest by following the correct path.
Sorry, I'm new here. How do I do that?
You walk, and then when you reach a fork in the road, read the question and pick the best answer.
If you are worthy and select the CORRECT answer, be sure and stop at the [color=yellow]pot of gold[/color] and read the explanation.
Each time you read an explanation, you'll get 5 seconds back on your time.
Entering the forest will begin the timer.
To move: use your arrows or WASD to move, or touch and hold the left side of your mobile screen.
